name: Jelly Dino
description:
A large angry red monster has taken Prof. Bebo! Reach his hideout and save Prof. Bebo, and make a friend along the way. Be careful though, if an enemy touches you you'll get bouncy, if you get too bouncy, you may just bounce out of the map!

Controls:

AD to move left and right.

W  to jump and double jump.

Esc to pause.
